description:
*Goal:*
 Architecture concept for Cloud^2 infrastructure based on OpenStack. . As we want to migrate our main cloud infrastructure into OpenStack, we have to know the network solution for that. We have to draw the idea and test it against all conditions we have for Private Cloud. Analysis, testing and choosing the network soultion for OpenStack that will be used by PrivateCloud.
 Automated Network Gateway and Templates for projects in OpenStack environment.We want our OpenStack hosting region to be self-managed by it's clients, we do not want to do manual tasks that will disturb our normal projects and will slow-down the clients waiting for the network to be configured. We need to automate the gateway configuration for all projects basing on 3 templates: dmz (no access to internal network), internal production, internal development (with allowed access to all internal resources). We will provide network templates and automate the process of creating new project in openstack with pre-configured network.

 

Kamienie milowe:

Uzgodniony plan działań Cloud2 dla PaaS - 10.04.2017

Openstack GW - przygotowanie template dla GW sieci- 24.04.2017
inititative_status:
Zespół Network pracuje w tym sprincie nad:
 Cloud2.0 Architektura dla PaaS - uzgodnienie planu działania z zespołem PaaS & IaaS

description:
We have built the MaaS service and we are using it to perform monitoring for all services running in our infrastructure. The MaaS service itself is being monitored by itself. This leads us to the situation where the MaaS relies on MaaS. We need to prepare simplified path for monitoring all components of MaaS but not using them at all. As the life showed us the problem with any of MaaS components will make it hard to check where the problem is. We will run another (small) in-line *Graphite* service used in emergency situations only for monitoring MaaS itself. We will perform test suites checking if MaaS and it's integration with VictorOps runs well. If not we will run emergency notifications (like email od other simple channel using VictorOps or StatusPage) to inform people in HelpDesk about problem in processing incident management.
 
 VictorOps integration channel for non-maas monitoring systems. We have few custom monitoring systems that are used by teams (like Observium, Cloudera) that we do not want to move into MaaS. For them we should automate escalation paths as well. To allow other than MaaS monitoring tools to use VictorOps we will implement *API for alerting*. This API will be monitored as the normal one and will allow to automate the process of alert escalation.
 Alerts triggered this way will be shown at Alert's Dashboard as well. Status of this alert will not be stored in MaaS, but will be proxied from VictorOps using its webhook API.

Migration of the MaaS to pgsql. It will give us much more stable environment by simplifying the application code and eliminating race conditions in the Escalator.
inititative_status:
Zespół PaaS pracuje w tym sprincie nad:
 * przekazaniem produkcyjnego API do alertowania (do przekazywania eventów) do VictorOps. Eventgenerator zostanie przepięty zostanie na nowe API.
 * metrykami o integracji z VictorOps, np czasy odpowiedzi między VictorOps api i EventGenerator itd.
 * testowym plan w bamboo realizujący testy sprawdzające czy integracja MaaS z Vops dział

Ponadto przeprowadzona została analiza monitoringu dla MaaS i przygotowane zadania do podjęcia realizacji.

description:
*What:* 
 Measuring the costs of using the backup service for all customers. Sharing the ToC of backup platform with PaaSMarket in accordance with Service Catalogue.

*Why:*
 Today the ToC of running the Backup Service is the internal cost of IT departament. In order to find the real source of these costs we have to find the metrics that will fairly divide costs of running servers, disc arrays, tape libraries and network devices working for backup service into the real products that use the platform.

*How:*
 We will review existing backup nodes and link them with service catalogue. Having this done, we will implement the backup usage reporting into PaaS Market. The reporting will take into account the parameters like: data size, I/O operations and cost of licenses from both TSM and Bacula backup system.

description: Goal: delivering technical requirements for subcontractor, analyzing and testing new functionalities for Suzan platform.

What:
 Changes in IaaS orchestration allowing to run VM instances in many subnets instead of one subnet that we use today. Implementation and production usage. Changes in LVS especially for customers relying on tun traffic mode.

Why:
 The changes are critical to be done in order to support PrivCloud growth. The changes are also the step into the IP-Fabric network architecture that is expected in OpenStack env.
 Today, our PrivateCloud environment has ~3500 VMs. These are ~3500 MAC addresses and we have one L3 network for all of them. The network best-practices recommend not to have more than 500 addesses in one L3 network. We have to fix it as without it we cannot scale-out the environment anymore and we cannot use all of currently purchased hosts.

How:
 Implementation of changes in IaaS orchestrator, reconfiguration of OpenNebula, changes in LVS traffic, testing the new instances in dev and prod environment.
 Production usage of currently disabled hosts that are located in new serverrack, that is dedicated to the new L3.

Milestones:
 * Launch of a new rack with a single network model L3 - 11.04.2017 - *in progress*

 * Automator supports L3 - 18.04. 2017 -  *in progress*
 * Prepared application measuring the network performance on the host / vm's - 30.04.2017

description:
*Celem projektu* jest integracja CRM U8, za pomocą  Integratora API (stanowiącego centralny hub komunikacyjny), z obecnymi adserverami FLAT i LPS, a docelowo DreamAdserverem (który finalnie połączy funkcjonalności obu systemów i ich odrębne interfejsy).   Integracja ta umożliwi spięcie end-to-end procesu reklamowego: od złożenia rezerwacji (CRM), poprzez realizację kampanii, po rozlicznie z Klientem kampanii oferowanym w modelu Flat-fee i pochodnych, dotąd realizowanych w adserverze FLAT i LPS. 

Milestones:
# Przygotowanie i określenie docelowej architektury (wraz z diagramem) i dokumentacją
# Przygotowanie mock'a API integratora 
# Przygotowanie docelowego API

description: Przeglądarka obrazków bazująca na obecnym mechanizmie wyszukiwania w Puls. Przeglądarka pozwoli na wpisanie frazy wyszukiwania oraz wybór jednego obrazka z listy wyników. Lista wyników będzie automatycznie rozszerzana aż do 500 elementów. Po wybraniu obrazka zostanie wyświetlona sekcja detalu wraz z podglądem całego obrazka oraz wszystkimi informacjami zwróconymi w wyniku wyszukiwania (dane dostarczane z istniejącej wyszukiwarki Pulsa).
Podgląd artykułów generowanych z Pulse2
Celem projektu jest zejście ze starej farmy i przeniesienie na chmurę dla szukaj.onet.pl

•	LandingPage tool for salary reasons (for SME)
•	XML veryfication tool for costumer products
•	A Simple version of the selfservice panel for SME
inititative_status: Project on track. We have the PoC of the first two Landin Pages for SME. The UX and graphics worsk are in progress
